title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: Bean and The Vicar of Dibley. The present-day company was founded in 1993 from the merger of Bennett-Jones' Tiger Television and Paul Sommers' Aspect Film & Television.

title: History - Paper Tiger Television
snippet: All contents are owned by Paper Tiger Television.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions (UK) | Closing Logo Group | Fandom
snippet: In 1993, it was then merged with Aspect Film & Television to form its current name. In June 2006, the company was purchased by IMG Media, but was later sold to the UK division of Endemol in November 2009. It is currently owned by Banijay since 2020.

title: Tiger Television - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Tiger Television was a British television production company that was formed in 1988 by Peter Bennett-Jones. It was particularly known for its sitcoms (most notably Mr. Bean), though it also specialised in shows from other genres.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions Ltd. | Encyclopedia.com
